sys_ui_script.description: Injects the AI In A Box chat widget on all pages via iframe. Checks if chat is enabled via GlideAjax before rendering.
sys_ui_script.name: AIAB Chat Global

sys_update_version.name: sys_ui_script_ed98f3d683e2b2104d4fccb6feaad393
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ui_script"><sys_ui_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><description>Injects the AI In A Box chat widget on all pages via iframe. Checks if chat is enabled via GlideAjax before rendering.</description><global>true</global><ignore_in_now_experience>false</ignore_in_now_experience><name>AIAB Chat Global</name><script><![CDATA[// AIAB Chat Global - Injects chat widget iframe on all pages
(function() {
  // Don't run in iframes or Service Portal
  if (window !== window.top) return;
  if (window.location.pathname.indexOf('/sp') === 0) return;
  if (window.location.pathname.indexOf('/$sp.do') === 0) return;
  
  // Check if chat is enabled for this user
  var ga = new GlideAjax('x_1756832_aiab.aiabAjax');
  ga.addParam('sysparm_name', 'isChatEnabled');
  ga.getXMLAnswer(function(response) {
    if (response !== 'true') return;
    
    // Remove existing chat if present (avoid duplicates on navigation)
    var existing = top.document.getElementById('aiab-chat-iframe');
    if (existing) existing.remove();
    
    // Detect current record context from g_form or URL
    var recordTable = '';
    var recordSysId = '';
    var recordDisplay = '';
    
    // Try g_form first (most reliable on form pages)
    if (typeof g_form !== 'undefined' && g_form.getTableName && g_form.getUniqueValue) {
      try {
        recordTable = g_form.getTableName() || '';
        recordSysId = g_form.getUniqueValue() || '';
        // Try to get display value from form header or number field
        if (typeof g_form.getValue === 'function') {
          recordDisplay = g_form.getValue('number') || g_form.getValue('name') || g_form.getValue('short_description') || '';
        }
      } catch (e) {
        console.warn('AIAB Chat: Could not get g_form context', e);
      }
    }
    
    // Fallback to URL params if g_form not available
    if (!recordTable || !recordSysId) {
      var urlParams = new URLSearchParams(window.location.search);
      recordTable = urlParams.get('sysparm_table') || urlParams.get('table') || '';
      recordSysId = urlParams.get('sys_id') || urlParams.get('sysparm_sys_id') || '';
      
      // Try to get table from URL path (e.g., /incident.do?sys_id=xxx)
      if (!recordTable && recordSysId) {
        var pathMatch = window.location.pathname.match(/\/([a-z_]+)\.do/i);
        if (pathMatch) {
          recordTable = pathMatch[1];
        }
      }
    }
    
    // Build iframe URL with context
    var iframeSrc = '/$sp.do?id=aiab_chat';
    if (recordTable && recordSysId) {
      iframeSrc += '&record_table=' + encodeURIComponent(recordTable);
      iframeSrc += '&record_sys_id=' + encodeURIComponent(recordSysId);
      if (recordDisplay) {
        iframeSrc += '&record_display=' + encodeURIComponent(recordDisplay);
      }
    }
    
    // Create iframe
    var iframe = document.createElement('iframe');
    iframe.id = 'aiab-chat-iframe';
    iframe.src = iframeSrc;
    iframe.style.cssText = 'position:fixed;bottom:0;right:0;width:420px;height:550px;border:none;z-index:10000;background:transparent;pointer-events:none;';
    iframe.setAttribute('allowtransparency', 'true');
    
    // Re-enable pointer events on the iframe content
    iframe.onload = function() {
      iframe.style.pointerEvents = 'auto';
    };
    
    top.document.body.appendChild(iframe);
  });
})();]]></script><script_name/><sys_class_name>sys_ui_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>opencode</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2026-01-22 17:30:31</sys_created_on><sys_id>ed98f3d683e2b2104d4fccb6feaad393</sys_id><sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count><sys_name>AIAB Chat Global</sys_name><sys_package display_value="AI in a Box" source="0439d1f593948210071230a97bba1016">0439d1f593948210071230a97bba1016</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="AI in a Box">0439d1f593948210071230a97bba1016</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ui_script_ed98f3d683e2b2104d4fccb6feaad393</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>opencode</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2026-01-22 18:29:29</sys_updated_on><ui_type>0</ui_type><use_scoped_format>false</use_scoped_format></sys_ui_script></record_update>
